comments.body: Unless you are planning to use this soon please remove the commented line.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/{{ name }}/{{ name }}/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
#  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}
